core-concepts.title: Core Concepts
core-concepts.subtitle: Learn all the core concepts you'll need to build effectively on 0x

mesh-beta-participation-guide.title: 0x Mesh beta participation guide
mesh-beta-participation-guide.description: Learn how to spin up a telemetry-enabled Mesh node and participate in the Beta!

mesh-json-rpc-usage-guide.title: 0x Mesh JSON-RPC usage guide
mesh-json-rpc-usage-guide.description: Learn how to connect to your Mesh node over Websockets using JSON-RPC

mesh-db-sync.title: How to sync 0x Mesh with an external database
mesh-db-sync.description: Learn the necessary steps to sync a 0x Mesh node with an external database. In syncing the two, you will be able to query Mesh liquidity in the querying language of your choice (e.g., SQL, GraphQL, etc...) either for yourself or your users.

mesh-deployment-guide.title: How to deploy a 0x Mesh node
mesh-deployment-guide.description: Learn how to spin up a non-browser Mesh node using Docker

contract-fillable-liquidity.title: Contract-fillable Liquidity
contract-fillable-liquidity.subtitle: Swap tokens by tapping into 0x's networked liquidity
contract-fillable-liquidity.description: Want to tap into 0x liquidity for your DeFi Dapp or protocol? Learn how to use @0x/asset-swapper to find the best priced 0x orders and format them so they can be filled by a smart contract.

0x-cheat-sheet.title: 0x cheat sheet
0x-cheat-sheet.description: All the information you look up often when building on 0x (e.g., deployed contract addresses)

integrate-instant.title: Get started with 0x Instant
integrate-instant.subtitle: A free and flexible way to offer simple crypto purchasing in any app or website
integrate-instant.description: Learn how to embed 0x Instant into your website or mobile app, allowing your users to seemlessly buy any digital asset with Ether

relayer-strategies.title: Relayer Strategies
relayer-strategies.description: Relayers can choose between multiple strategies when building on 0x. This guide will walk you through several options and they relative trade-offs.

legal-guide.title: 0x Legal Guide
legal-guide.description: A legal guide that will walk you through some of the relevant laws and regulations that developers building on 0x should be aware of.

using-the-standard-relayer-api.title: How to use the Standard Relayer API
using-the-standard-relayer-api.description: This guide will show you how to use the @0x/connect package to connect to a Relayer adhering to the Standard Relayer API

v2-coordinatior-specification.title: 0x Coordinator Specification (v2)
v2-coordinatior-specification.description: A comprehensive technical spec of the first coordinator model developer by the 0x core team (soft-cancel variant)

v2-forwarder-specification.title: 0x Forwarder Specification (v2)
v2-forwarder-specification.description: The technical spec for the Forwarder 0x extension contract that is used by 0x Instant to abstract away wrapping ETH, setting allowances and paying fees. Learn how it works and how you can use it directly in your own projects.

v2-specification.title: 0x Protocol Specification (v2)
v2-specification.description: A comprehensive, technical specification of the 0x protocol useful for anyone trying to understand how the protocol works in precise detail.

web3-provider-explained.title: Web3 Providers Explained
web3-provider-explained.description: Learn more about what an Web3 Provider is and how it enables your dApp to communicate with the Ethereum blockchain and request transaction signatures from users.

market-making-on-0x.title: Market-making on 0x
market-making-on-0x.description: Learn how to market-make on 0x, and what the differences are between trading on a CEX vs. DEX

0x-extensions-explained.title: 0x Extensions explained
0x-extensions-explained.description: Learn about how you can extend 0x protocol with your own custom extensions adding white-listing, dutch auction mechanics and much more to 0x.

asset-swapper.title: @0x/asset-swapper
asset-swapper.description: Convenience package for discovering and performing swaps for any ERC20 Assets

0x-js.title: 0x.js
0x-js.description: An umbrella package that exports all the 0x tools you need to start building on 0x. Includes: @0x/order-utils, @0x/contract-wrappers and @0x/contract-addresses.

connect.title: @0x/connect
connect.description: An HTTP/WS client for interacting with the Standard Relayer API

asset-buyer.title: @0x/asset-buyer
asset-buyer.description: Convenience package for discovering and buying assets with Ether

ethereum-types.title: ethereum-types
ethereum-types.description: Typescript types shared across Ethereum-related packages/libraries/tools

order-utils.title: @0x/order-utils
order-utils.description: A set of utilities for generating, parsing, signing and validating 0x orders

sol-compiler.title: @0x/sol-compiler
sol-compiler.description: A wrapper around solc-js that adds smart re-compilation, ability to compile an entire project, Solidity version specific compilation, standard input description support and much more.

mesh-ts-client.description: A Typescript/Javascript library for interacting with the Mesh JSON-RPC API over WebSockets
mesh-ts-client.title: @0x/ts-mesh-client

radar-relay-sdk.title: RadarRelay SDK
radar-relay-sdk.description: The Radar Relay SDK is a software development kit that simplifies the interactions with Radar Relay’s APIs

tokenlon-sdk.title: Tokenlon SDK
tokenlon-sdk.description: Tokenlon SDK provides APIs for developers to trade of imToken's relayer

ganache-cli.title: 0xorg/ganache-cli
ganache-cli.description: Spin up a Ganache test Ethereum node with the 0x smart contracts pre-deployed

launch-kit-backend-docker.title: 0xorg/launch-kit-backend
launch-kit-backend-docker.description: A pre-built Standard Relayer API backend server

launch-kit-frontend-docker.title: 0xorg/launch-kit-frontend
launch-kit-frontend-docker.description: An ERC20 exchange and ERC721 marketplace React front-end to use with any SRA API backend

launch-kit-demo.title: 0xorg/launch-kit-demo
launch-kit-demo.description: A demo of the front-end and backend Launch Kits running together

mesh.title: 0xorg/mesh
mesh.description: A peer-to-peer network for sharing 0x orders

0x-order-utils.title: 0x-order-utils
0x-order-utils.description: A set of utilities for generating, parsing, signing and validating 0x orders in Python

0x-sra-client.title: 0x-sra-client
0x-sra-client.description: A Python client for interacting with servers conforming to the Standard Relayer API specification

open-relay.title: OpenRelay
open-relay.description: OpenRelay is an open source relay for the 0x protocol. OpenRelay provides an open, scalable orderbook. Users can post offers for any ERC20 or ERC721 token, or search for trades with other users.

go-mesh-client.title: Golang Mesh RPC Client
go-mesh-client.description: A Golang library for interacting with the Mesh JSON-RPC API over WebSockets

launch-kit-frontend.title: 0x Launch Kit Frontend
launch-kit-frontend.description: An ERC20 exchange and ERC721 marketplace react frontend UI for any SRA relayer

launch-kit-backend.title: 0x Launch Kit Backend
launch-kit-backend.description: An open-source relayer backend that implements the Standard Relayer API

starter-project.title: 0x Starter Project
starter-project.description: A project showcasing how to get started with 0x.js. This project will take you through a number of scenarios using the 0x v2 protocol.

code-sandbox.title: 0x Code Sandbox
code-sandbox.description: An online code sandbox for playing around with 0x protocol. Mint test tokens, create, fill, cancel 0x orders and much more.

migrations.title: @0x/migrations
migrations.description: A package to deploy the 0x protocol's system of smart contracts to the testnet of your choice

launch-kit-wizard.title: @0x/launch-kit-wizard
launch-kit-wizard.description: A “create-react-app”-style CLI for spinning up a 0x Relayer

massive.title: Massive CLI
massive.description: A set of command-line tools for creating command-line scripts for interacting with the Ethereum blockchain in general, and 0x in particular

coordinator-server.title: Coordinator Server
coordinator-server.description: A reference implementation of a 0x coordinator server (soft-cancel variant)
